title: Which is the cheapest Windows Pro laptop you can use for daily tasks? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all Windows Pro is software, laptop is hardware. You can practically* (this has some exceptions) install any system on any laptop. If you currently have a laptop that fulfils your need, but it doesn’t have windows pro on it, and you need it to have windows pro on it for some reason you might be better off purchasing the software upgrade. Now on to the question. Tell me your daily tasks and I’ll tell you the answer.(Since you can’t I’ll assume its watching videos, reading and writing mails and maybe running some not so demanding software) If so I’d suggest T490s as a great thin and light laptop that is high quality and can serve you for years to come without breaking the bank. Lenovo ThinkPad T490s | Work From Home Laptop | Lenovo US There are cheaper options and alternatives but the base model would be great for anyone that wants a good portable laptop for every day use.
